recipesJson.name: Steep PopDeez: Cloning with the Crew
recipesJson.author: shakenvape007
recipesJson.description:
Update after a few weeks. After a few weeks steep recipe is steeping nice. I also have another version which I will just update notes Here. You can sub out the fw butterscotch ripple, wf caramel butter and replace it with TPA butterscotch at 3% and FA Carmel at 0.75% give about 2 weeks as well. It will be more butterscotch top notes and a deeper caramel flavor. Both are good imo but that's up to you on how you want to mix the recipe ðŸ˜‹ enjoy.

Diy Mixers Crew attempt at Steep PopDeez. #DMC #cloningwiththecrew #popdeez

Recipe notes here=====> https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QQTSOsd8pbg

New mixers always welcome=====>  https://www.facebook.com/groups/dmcdiy/
